title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 9 - Driver License Qualifications After Loss Of Consciousness
content:

§ 9.5 - Submission of physician's, physician assistant's or nurse practitioner's statements as a condition for licensing

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 9

Statutory authority: Vehicle and Traffic Law, §§ 215, 502, 510[3][b]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
